title: Three in One Aerobics Programme
creator_credit: Charles Cochrane, Grant Donovan and Steve Graham
brief_description: The aerobic program includes: 1. Loco Warm-Up. - 2. Stretching. - 3. Aerobic Introduction. - 4. Aerobic Standing. - 5. Aerobic Circuit. - 6. Aerobic Floor. - 7. Cool Down Stretch. - 8. Relaxation.
